title: pantheon different in the store?
body:
so i noticed a while back that pantheon store splash is different to his current splash.... whats up? is this to be his updated splash?

http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z459/Tom_Smoodger/asdsad_zps9vas9zxu.jpg

replies.body: I noticed this too, its been on the PBE for months now, but nothing has come of it.
I noticed this a while ago. It's been in the store for several patches now. Hopefully it will be fully implemented into the game soon.
